8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Hasan bin Ali narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "The gift for the fasting person is (fragrant) oil and a censer

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تُحْفَةِ الصَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Gift For The Fasting Person
